channel.title: SSL on TC blog
channel.description: Recent content in SSL on TC blog

item.title: How to set up HTTPS server with flask with personal domain
item.description: Background I currently has a personal website that hosted in the github page with React. In the React I also call the backend server with RESTful API. My backend server is using AWS ec2 and I just used Python Flask for easy use. In the past, I just expose the flask app to a port and in the React App to call this http://ip:port to get the data. However, this method did not work properly if the github pages are in https because it would be fixed http and https.
